adviseProfiledMethods

@Match(value="*")
@Order(value="after:*")
public static void adviseProfiledMethods(org.apache.tapestry5.ioc.MethodAdviceReceiver receiver)
Advise all methods that are tagged with the Profiled annotation.
This only works when annotations are placed on the interface and NOT implementation classes!

Parameters:
receiver -
